"We are too vulnerable right now to launch attacks." Megatron turned
around, showing the base. "It is right in the open, where the Stunticons
landed it. They may be formidable warriors, but they have no sense of
defense." Megatron opened his com-link once again. "Switchblade, I need
you out here on the double." He looked at Shockwave. "Switchblade can
fix him." he commented.
